abstract: Food and Drug Admin approves use of attention-deficit disorder drug Vyvanse as treatment for binge-eating disorder.
lead_paragraph: Federal health regulators have approved Vyvanse, an attention-deficit disorder drug, for a new use as a first-of-its kind treatment for binge-eating disorder.
snippet: Federal health regulators have approved Vyvanse, an attention-deficit disorder drug, for a new use as a first-of-its kind treatment for binge-eating disorder.

headline.main: F.D.A. Approves a Drug for Binge-Eating Disorder
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Approves a Drug for Binge-Eating Disorder
